Maharashtra's only Fort Heritage hotel, Fort Jadhavgadh Hotel and Resort is a must visit to experience unparalleled luxury.
Spread across 25 acres, features within the heritage hotel include:
Comfortable and lavish accommodations (including tent accommodations) A temperature controlled swimming pool A beautifully decorated and furnished dining area An in house spa An in house museum Other activities at Fort Jadhavgadh include Ghazal Nights and a gripping Daan Patta show.

Please call up the authorities and inform them before visiting the fort. If you intend to stay at the resort, booking a room/ tent in advance is recommended. Please check the official website for accommodation tariffs.
